main.description: Get a (usually signed) URL from to upload a blob too before referencing within a record. May receive different urls depending on blob metadata and the application that it is inteded for. Requires auth, implemented by PDS.

size.description: Size of the blob in bytes.

collection.description: Collection of the record that the blob is intended for.

uploadId.description: An opaque identifier string to be passed back in com.atproto.repo.finalizeBlobUpload.
